org.jsfml.graphics

Interface ConstView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Const
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    View

    public interface ConstView
extends Const
    Interface for read-only views.

    It provides methods to can gain information from a view, but none to modify it in any way.

    Note that this interface is expected to be implemented by a View. It is not recommended to be implemented outside of the JSFML API.

    See Also:
    Const

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2f getCenter()
      Gets the current center of the view.
      Transform getInverseTransform()
      Gets the inverse of the view's current transformation matrix as determined by its center, size and rotation angle.
      float getRotation()
      Gets the current rotation angle of the view in degrees.
      Vector2f getSize()
      Gets the current dimensions of the view in pixels.
      Transform getTransform()
      Gets the view's current transformation matrix as determined by its center, size and rotation angle.
      FloatRect getViewport()
      Gets the current viewport rectangle of this view.
